LanguageData.DMS_Gecko_FlameTurret.label: Flame Turret
LanguageData.DMS_Gecko_FlameTurret.description: A flame launcher used by mechs that can effectively ignite flammable materials within a range
LanguageData.DMS_Iguana_SubMachineGun.label: light MachineGun turret
LanguageData.DMS_Iguana_SubMachineGun.description:
Supressive weapon chambered in pistol caliber round.
This weapon is designed specially for mounted use, so only specific unit can equip it.
LanguageData.DMS_Tarbosaurus_ShotgunGun.label: close inbound defense system
LanguageData.DMS_Tarbosaurus_ShotgunGun.description: a multi-barrel turret designed to suppress enemies in close-range.
LanguageData.DMS_Tarbosaurus_SubMachineGun.label: Heavy MachineGun turret
LanguageData.DMS_Tarbosaurus_SubMachineGun.descriptio:
heavy machine gun for mech soldier or infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specially for mounted use, so only specific unit can equip it.
